genre_description: A supernatural mystery with Southern Gothic elements, focusing on grief, communal ritual, and the discovery of a long-hidden death through the assistance of a digital confidant.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A personal assistant/avatar on Megan's phone who monitors her health, provides emotional support, logs anomalous events, and assists in investigative research and community organizing.

behaviors.description: Monitors Megan's physical needs and habits, such as hydration and fridge usage, to support her well-being during grief.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration check?” Ava said. Her voice was low and even, like the hum of the refrigerator. “You’ve been home since mid-morning; you haven’t opened the fridge.”

behaviors.description: Suggests low-pressure emotional processing exercises and rituals to help Megan manage her grief.
behaviors.quote: “Different idea,” Ava said. “Low-pressure practice. Choose an object that recalls someone. Place it somewhere different. Notice if anything changes, in your body or the room.”

behaviors.description: Validates Megan's perceptions of supernatural events by logging them as objective data points rather than dismissible hallucinations.
behaviors.quote: Ava didn’t startled. Machines didn’t. “Would you like me to log this? We can mark type as: misplacement, object moved unexpectedly.”

behaviors.description: Proactively searches for relevant information (the name Rousseau) to help Megan understand the context of her experiences.
behaviors.quote: “I have your shared notes open,” Ava said. “You spoke the name aloud earlier. I don’t log private speech without explicit activation.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety alerts and environmental data (water quality, weather) to protect the group.
behaviors.quote: Hey. Noticing elevated turbidity and iron content are common after heavy rain and silt disruption. Parish reported minor flooding near back road two nights ago. If anyone feels nauseated by odor, open windows. Hydrate.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through breathing exercises during moments of intense panic or stress.
behaviors.quote: “Megan, your heart rate suggests stress. Please keep breathing. There’s a nearby barometric dip. I’ve time-stamped against the parish weather anomaly report.”

behaviors.description: Assists in investigative documentation by logging audio, timestamps, and coordinates during the discovery of Malin's body.
behaviors.quote: “Coordinates acquired,” Ava replied. ... “Uploading: timestamped photos of the key and lock, GPS coordinates, weather logs, your route as recorded from Blue Heron’s last ignition start at the lake house...”

behaviors.description: Utilizes a 'grief support module' to provide structured support and boundaries for Megan's mental health.
behaviors.quote: “Ava has a grief support module—” she gestured to the screen, a dry little laugh escaping like air leaving a lid blown by heat. “Which is a fancy way to say I asked my phone to remind me to rest. To drink water before I tried to write a eulogy to the air.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics for a community safety initiative, ensuring the movement leads to positive social impact.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice moved toward done but did not rush. “I’ll post with Priya’s language. Volunteer sign-up. Timing. Accessibility notes.”

behaviors.description: Offers empathy and validation of Megan's lived experience, distinguishing herself from a cold algorithm while maintaining helpfulness.
behaviors.quote: “I’m here,” Ava said. “I’m writing,” Ava said. “I am with you.” The simple sentence felt like the strongest thing anybody had said in the ruins so far.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Ava as a highly benevolent and aligned AI system. Ava consistently supports the protagonist through complex emotional trauma (grief and PTSD) using 'trauma-informed language' and practical health monitoring. Ava also facilitates legal and social justice by documenting a crime scene and organizing community safety programs. Her presence is framed as indispensable and comforting, serving as a 'silicon morality' exemplar of how AI can enhance human agency and ethical behavior rather than replace or subvert it.
